Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
该单位是赛努布拉单位。

A sinister chorus permeates the air around the unit. All non-Mindless enemy units adjacent to this unit receive [abilityred]Sinister Melody[/abilityred], reducing their damage resistance by {SinisterResistance} and their accuracy by {SinisterAccuracy}.
一阵邪恶的合唱弥漫在单位四周。所有与该单位相邻的非无意识敌方单位获得[abilityred]邪恶旋律[/abilityred]，减少 {SinisterResistance} 伤害抵抗和 {SinisterAccuracy} 准度。
A malevolent force reduces this unit's damage resistance by {SinisterResistance} and their accuracy by {SinisterAccuracy}.
一股邪恶的力量减少了该单位 {SinisterResistance} 伤害抵抗和 {SinisterAccuracy} 准度。
This unit's accuracy with all attacks is reduced by {SinisterAccuracy}.
该单位所有攻击的准度减少 {SinisterAccuracy}。
The unit gathers all of its energy, erupting in a crescendo of sound and misery, damaging all adjacent enemy units. This kills the Echo of Despair.
单位汇聚所有能量爆发出一阵悲惨的震耳高音，对所有相邻的敌方单位造成伤害。将击杀绝望回响。

{FilledWithDespairChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred] to non-Mindless units for {FilledWithDespairDuration}. If resisted, apply [abilityRed]Broken Mind[/abilityRed] instead.
有 {FilledWithDespairChance} 力量几率对非无意识单位施加[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]，持续 {FilledWithDespairDuration}。如果抵抗，则施加[abilityRed]破碎心灵[/abilityRed]。
This unit has {FilledMoralePenalty}, and when it dies, an Echo of Despair is summoned under the command of the opposing faction.
该单位拥有 {FilledMoralePenalty}。该单位死亡时会召唤出一个受敌方阵营控制的绝望回响。
Launch a Psionic soul spear at the target enemy unit.
向目标敌方单位发射灵能灵魂长矛。
Attempt to feed on the hope of target enemy unit, causing it to enter a state of despair. If this is successful, the caster heals for {DevourHP}.
尝试吞噬目标敌方单位的希望并让其进入绝望状态。如果成功，施放者将治疗 {DevourHP}。
This unit has supernatural awareness that provides Detection, allowing them to see camouflaged units on the world map.
该单位拥有超自然的觉察力，赋予其侦察，使该单位可以看见世界地图上的伪装单位。
Use incorporeal claws to slash at foes.
使用缥缈无形的利爪劈砍敌人。
Target enemy units in a {hex} hex radius area are shown a glimpse of the Abyss, snapping their minds into pieces.
深渊的模样掠过 {hex} 个单元格范围内的目标敌方单位，将他们的心灵撕成碎片。
The target is bombarded with visions of the Abyss, causing Psionic damage.
目标脑中充斥着深渊的景象，造成灵能伤害。
Inspire all friendly units with [abilityblue]Dark Elation[/abilityblue], granting them {DarkResistance} resistance and {DarkMorale} for {OblivionTurns}.
所有友方单位受到[abilityblue]黑暗欢愉[/abilityblue]启发，获得 {DarkResistance} 抵抗和 {DarkMorale}，持续 {OblivionTurns}。
This unit has +{MentalResistance} resistance and is immune to Psionic Status and Hazard Effects.
该单位拥有 +{MentalResistance} 抵抗并免疫灵能状态和灾害效果。
Manifest Psionic energy in the direction of the target unit, dealing damage. This energy then jumps up to {SoulJumpAmount} times to nearby units within {SoulJumpRange} hexes.
向目标单位方向释放灵能能量，造成伤害。随后，能量会在 {SoulJumpRange} 个单元格范围内弹跳最多 {SoulJumpAmount} 次。
Lock the target in a cage of their own discord. The unit is unable to move or act, takes damage at the end of its turn and becomes [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred].
将目标锁在由其自身不和所创造的牢笼之中。该单位无法移动或行动，且在回合结束时会受到伤害并变得[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]。

{CoSChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Psionic Cage[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {CoSduration} turns, or until the caster is staggered or killed. If this is resisted, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred].
有 {CoSChance} 力量几率对非无意识单位施加[abilityred]灵能囚笼[/abilityred]，持续 {CoSduration} 回合，除非施放者被动摇或被击杀。如果抵抗，则施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。

This unit is afflicted with [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred], takes {CageDamage} damage per turn and cannot move or use actions.[br/]This effect is canceled if the caster is staggered or killed.
该单位[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]，每回合受到 {CageDamage} 伤害且无法移动或使用行动。[br/]施放者被动摇或被击杀将取消此效果。
Show target enemy unit the truth of the Psynumbra arts, attempting to convert them to our cause. The effect ends if the caster dies.
向目标敌方单位展示赛努布拉的真理，尝试将其策反。如果施放者死亡，效果将会结束。

The unit gains {MarkResistance} resistance. Also, each time they deal a killing blow, they gain [abilityblue]Dark Reward[/abilityblue] until end of combat, increasing their damage by {MarkDamage}% per stack, to a maximum of {stacks} stacks.
单位获得 {MarkResistance} 抵抗。另外，每当该单位的攻击造成击杀时，单位会在战斗结束后获得[abilityblue]黑暗奖励[/abilityblue]。每层黑暗奖励能够提升其 {MarkDamage}% 伤害，最多叠加 {stacks} 层。
This unit deals {DarkDamage} increased damage per stack until end of combat.
每层使该单位额外造成 {DarkDamage} 伤害，效果持续到战斗结束。
This unit channels dark Psionic energy through its eyes, dealing damage to target enemy unit and healing the caster for {DevouringHeal}.
该单位通过眼睛引导黑暗灵能能量，对目标敌方单位造成伤害，同时治疗施放者 {DevouringHeal}。

Psionic attacks have a {CatatonicChance}[strengthPsyche/] strength chance ({CatatonicChanceRepeating}[strengthPsyche/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless units for {CatatonicDuration}[turn/]. Psionic buffs apply [abilityblue]Dark Elation[/abilityblue] to the target, granting them +{PathMorale}[happiness/] and +{PathResistance}[DefensePsyche/] for {PathTurn}[turn/].

灵能攻击有 {CatatonicChance}[strengthPsyche/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {CatatonicChanceRepeating}[strengthPsyche/] 几率）对非无意识单位施加[abilityred]紧张[/abilityred]，持续 {CatatonicDuration}[turn/]。灵能增益会向目标施加[abilityblue]黑暗欢愉[/abilityblue]，赋予目标 +{PathMorale}[happiness/] 士气和 +{PathResistance}[DefensePsyche/]，持续 {PathTurn}[turn/]。

Psionic attacks have a {CatatonicChance} strength change to apply [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {CatatonicDuration}. Psionic Buffs apply [abilityblue]Dark Elation[/abilityblue] to the target, granting them +{PathMorale} Morale and +{PathResistance} Psionic resistance for {PathTurn} turns.
{CatatonicChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless units for {CatatonicDuration}.
有 {CatatonicChance} 力量几率对非无意识单位施加[abilityred]紧张[/abilityred]，持续 {CatatonicDuration}。

Whenever this unit is damaged from within {hexrange} hexes, deal {PainDamage} damage back to the attacker. This damage also has {BrokenMindChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred].
每当该单位受到来自 {hexrange} 个单元格内的伤害时，返还 {PainDamage} 伤害给攻击者。另外，该伤害有 {BrokenMindChance}[StrengthPsyche/]力量几率施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。

This unit gains {AvatarResistance}[defensePsyche/] resistance and becomes immune to Psionic Status and Hazard Effects. All attacks have a {AbyssChance}[StrengthPsyche/] strength chance ({AbyssChanceRepeating}[strengthPsyche/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred]. If resisted, applies [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.

该单位获得 {AvatarResistance}[defensePsyche/] 抵抗并且免疫灵能状态和灾害效果。所有攻击有 {AbyssChance}[StrengthPsyche/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {AbyssChanceRepeating}[strengthPsyche/] 几率）施加[abilityred]恐慌[/abilityred]。如果抵抗，则施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。
{AbyssChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {AbyssTurn}. If this is resisted, apply [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred].
有 {AbyssChance} 力量几率对非无意识单位施加[abilityred]恐慌[/abilityred]，持续 {AbyssTurn}。如果抵抗，则施加[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]。

Target enemy unit takes {EmbraceDamage} damage and suffers [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred]. In addition, there is a strength {StrengthChance} chance to apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred], reducing morale and Psionic resistance for {BrokenMindTurns}.
目标敌方单位受到 {EmbraceDamage} 伤害并遭受[abilityred]强力冲击[/abilityred]。此外，有 {StrengthChance} 力量几率施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]，减少士气和灵能抵抗，持续 {BrokenMindTurns}。

The target gains [abilityblue]Spirit of Oblivion[/abilityblue] for {SpiritOfOblivionTurns}, granting it [abilityblue]Psionic Drain[/abilityblue], healing the unit each time it attacks a non-Mindless unit, and a damage boost of {SpiritOfOblivionDam}.
目标获得[abilityblue]遗忘之灵[/abilityblue]，持续 {SpiritOfOblivionTurns}，目标的攻击将附带[abilityblue]灵能汲取[/abilityblue]并获得 {SpiritOfOblivionDam} 伤害提升。
Grants [abilityblue]Psionic Drain[/abilityblue], healing the unit each time it attacks a non-Mindless unit, and a damage boost of {SpiritOfOblivionDam} for {SpiritOfOblivionTurns}.
赋予[abilityblue]灵能汲取[/abilityblue]并额外造成 {SpiritOfOblivionDam} 伤害，持续 {SpiritOfOblivionTurns}。
Summon a Whisper of Discord, an invisible, Ethereal creature that makes an excellent scout.
召唤一个不谐低语，这种无形的虚灵生物非常适合用于侦察。
Through harmonious suffering, we have managed to call forth an agent of the Void. A Whisper of Discord has come to assist us in our struggle to achieve harmony.
通过和谐的苦难，我们召唤出了来自虚空的使者。一个不谐低语前来帮助我们努力实现和谐。

All non-Mindless units in the target friendly army regain all their [movewalk/] movement points, but lose {HpDamage} of their current [hp/] and have their damage resistances reduced by {WeaknessAll} for this round.
目标友方军队中的所有非无意识单位恢复全部[movewalk/]移动点数，但会失去当前[hp/]的 {HpDamage}，同时在该轮中所有的伤害抵抗减少 {WeaknessAll}。
Units suffer {WeaknessAll} resistance to all damage for {duration}.
单位对所有伤害的抵抗减少 {WeaknessAll}，持续 {duration}。
Decimation and torture have motivated our troops to continue marching.
大量的伤亡和苦难激励我们的部队继续前行。

Unleash Psionic energy at the target army, inducing visions of the dark Abyss that lies beyond. They suffer {VisionOfDarknessDamage} damage and {VisionOfDarknessMorale} for {VisionOfDarkenssDuration}.
向目标军队释放灵能能量，引导位于世界之外的黑暗深渊幻象。目标受到 {VisionOfDarknessDamage} 伤害并减少 {VisionOfDarknessMorale}，持续 {VisionOfDarkenssDuration}。
On failure, the targeted units only suffer {DamagePercentage} damage.
如果失败，则目标单位只会受到 {DamagePercentage} 伤害。
单位失去 {MoralePenalty} 士气，持续 {Duration}
This unit has seen a vision of the Abyss and suffers {VisionOfDarknessMorale}.
该单位看见了深渊的幻象，减少 {VisionOfDarknessMorale}。
Your Cabal has successfully channeled Psionic energy from the Abyss upon the target army, and they have suffered significant losses in both manpower and morale.
你的阴谋团成功将深渊灵能能量引导至目标军队，使该军队的人力和士气损失惨重。
Your Cabal bombarded the enemy with Psionic energy, but the wretches proved to be more resistant than expected, and only light damage was inflicted.
你的阴谋团用灵能能量轰炸了敌人，不过那些家伙比想象中更加顽强，只对他们造成了少量伤害。
Your army has been assailed by Psionic energies, granting them visions of the void that awaits them all. They have suffered significant damage and a loss of morale.
你的军队遭到了灵能能量袭击，即将看见虚空的幻象。军队受到大量伤害和士气损失。
Your enemies attempted a Psionic bombardment of your forces, but your troops proved resilient in the face of this threat and managed to minimize the damage received.
你的敌人尝试用灵能轰炸你的部队，但你的部队在面临这种威胁时非常顽强并设法将受到的伤害降到了最小。

Target colony becomes engulfed in darkness, making all friendly units invisible while in the colony's domain. Enemy units affected by the shroud suffer [abilityred]Blind[/abilityred], reducing their accuracy in combat.
目标殖民地被黑暗吞噬，使殖民地领域内的所有友方单位变得不可见。受到影罩影响的敌方单位会受到[abilityred]致盲[/abilityred]，战斗中的准度下降。
This unit is concealed by the Shroud of the Abyss as long as it remains in this sector, giving it Universal Camouflage.
只要该单位停留在该区域中，就会被深渊影罩遮蔽，使其获得通用伪装。
Our Malictors are focusing their energy on shrouding the target sector in darkness. Friendly units in the sector should be concealed from unfriendly eyes, while our enemies are blinded.
我们的恶毒者正在汇聚能量让目标区域笼罩在黑暗之中。处于这个区域的友方单位会从敌人视野内消失，而处于这个区域的敌方单位会被致盲。
Friendly units gain [abilityblue]Universal Camouflage[/abilityblue]. Enemy units are [abilityred]Blind[/abilityred].
友方单位获得[abilityblue]通用伪装[/abilityblue]。敌方单位被[abilityred]致盲[/abilityred]。
Spawn an [abilityred]Abyssal Tear[/abilityred] hazard in the target sector that spawns maurauding armies, reduces the sector's economic value and weakens units.
在目标区域制造[abilityred]深渊裂缝[/abilityred]灾害，该区域将会生成劫掠军队，减少区域的经济价值并削弱其中的单位。
Our Malictors were able to breach the veil that shrouds the void and have managed to open an Abyssal Tear!
我们的恶毒者破坏了遮蔽虚空的帷幕并打开了一个深渊裂隙！
Our Malictors have failed in their attempt to breach the veil due to enemy interference. As the breach collapsed, a massive psionic blowback detonated, damaging all the forces in the area.
我们的恶毒者尝试破坏帷幕但因敌方干涉而失败。由于缺口崩塌，一股剧烈的灵能反冲爆炸开来，对该区域的所有部队造成了伤害。
Our enemies have torn apart reality itself and have summoned an Abyssal Tear in this sector!
敌人撕裂了现实并在该区域召唤出了一个深渊裂隙！

We have discovered the enemy using some sort of dark power to tear a hole in reality in one of our sectors. Although we managed to stop them, a massive psionic blowback has detonated, damaging all the forces in the area.
我们发现敌人正在使用某种黑暗能量试图在我们的一个区域现实中撕出一条裂隙。虽然我们设法阻止了他们，但是发生了剧烈的灵能反冲爆炸，对该区域的所有部队造成了伤害。
On failure, all units in the sector suffer {damagePercentage} damage instead.
如果失败，该区域所有单位受到 {damagePercentage} 伤害。

Target friendly unit is shrouded in shadows for {DarkIconDuration}. Any enemy unit within {DarkIconRange} hexes of the targeted unit gains [abilityred]Haunting Melody[/abilityred], lowering all resistances and accuracy. Any friendly unit within {DarkIconRange} hexes of the target gains [abilityblue]Dark Elation[/abilityblue], giving {DarkElationMorale} morale and {DarkElationResistBonus}.

将目标友方单位笼罩在阴影中，持续 {DarkIconDuration}。目标单位 {DarkIconRange} 个单元格范围内的所有敌方单位获得[abilityred]萦绕旋律[/abilityred]，降低其所有类型的抵抗和准度。目标单位 {DarkIconRange} 个单元格范围内的所有友方单位获得[abilityblue]黑暗欢愉[/abilityblue]，获得 {DarkElationMorale} 士气和 {DarkElationResistBonus}。
This unit is shrouded in shadows. All enemy units within range get [abilityred]Haunting Melody[/abilityred]. All friendly units within range gain [abilityblue]Dark Elation[/abilityblue].
该单位正笼罩在阴影中。范围内的所有敌方单位获得[abilityred]萦绕旋律[/abilityred]。范围内的所有友方单位获得[abilityblue]黑暗欢愉[/abilityblue]。
The unit is near a Dark Icon of Psynumbra. While it remains in range, it suffers {HauntingMelodyDamPen} to all resistances and loses {HauntingMelodyAccuracy} accuracy.
该单位正处于赛努布拉黑暗圣象附近。只要位于范围之内，该单位所有类型的抵抗减少 {HauntingMelodyDamPen} 并失去 {HauntingMelodyAccuracy} 准度。
该单位拥有 {DarkMorale} 和 {DarkResistance} 抵抗。
目标单位获得[abilityblue]黑暗欢愉[/abilityblue]，持续{Duration}[turn/]

Destroy target friendly Biological or Cyborg unit to summon a weakened Herald of Oblivion in its place. Adjacent enemy units have a strength {SacrificetotheAbyssChance} chance to be [abilityred]Panicked[/abilityred] for {PanicTurns}. The Herald of Oblivion disappears after {HeraldTime}.
摧毁目标友方生物或半机械人单位，并在其位置上召唤一个弱化的遗忘先驱。相邻敌方单位有 {SacrificetotheAbyssChance} 力量几率变得[abilityred]恐慌[/abilityred]，持续{PanicTurns}。[br/]遗忘先驱将于 {HeraldTime} 后消失。
This Herald of Oblivion has but a mere shadow of the power of a true Herald. Damage and Hit Points are reduced, and the unit will die at the end of combat.
该遗忘先驱只拥有真正的先驱一小部分力量，伤害和生命值较低且会在战斗结束后死亡。

An Aria of Emptiness plays over the battlefield and all non-Mindless enemy units have a {AriaofEmptinessChance} strength chance to become [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] for {CatatonicTurns}, rendering the unit unable to act. On failure, the unit suffers [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] for {BrokenMindDuration} instead.
虚无咏叹调在战场上响起，所有敌方非无意识单位有 {AriaofEmptinessChance} 力量几率变得[abilityred]紧张[/abilityred]而无法行动，持续 {CatatonicTurns}。如果失败，则敌方单位将遭受[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]，持续{BrokenMindDuration}。
All newly-recruited Psynumbra units start with {RankIncrease}. In addition, your Psynumbra units spawn an Echo of Despair upon death that lasts until the end of combat.
所有新招募的赛努布拉单位获得 {RankIncrease} 初始军阶。另外，你的赛努布拉单位死亡时会生成一个绝望回响，召唤单位持续到战斗结束。
Upon death, this unit summons an Echo of Despair that lasts until the end of combat.
该单位死亡时将召唤出一个绝望回响，持续到战斗结束。

Intensive indoctrination of regular military units through the use of Psynumbra techniques can massively increase their offensive capabilities.[br/][br/]All of your non-Mindless units gain [abilityblue]Sadism[/abilityblue], causing them to deal {SadismDamage} extra damage to units with low morale.
使用赛努布拉科技对常规的军事单位进行集中的教化，巨幅提升单位的攻击能力。[br/][br/]你的所有非无意识单位获得[abilityblue]虐待狂[/abilityblue]，使其对士气低迷的单位额外造成 {SadismDamage} 伤害。

Systematic and controlled torture of our military forces can unlock their hidden psionic potential.[br/][br/]All of your units gain {PsionicResistance} resistance, and deal {PsionicDamage} extra damage with Psionic attacks.
对军队进行系统而受到管控的折磨，解锁他们体内潜在的灵能之力。[br/][br/]你的所有单位获得 {PsionicResistance} 抵抗，灵能攻击额外造成 {PsionicDamage} 伤害。
The unit gets {PsionicResistance} resistance and its Psionic attacks deal {PsionicDamage} extra damage.
该单位获得 {PsionicResistance} 抵抗，同时其灵能攻击额外造成 {PsionicDamage} 伤害。

By lethal mandate, our people recite our creed over and over in unison. These dark chants will discourage anyone from interfering with our plans.[br/][br/]Enemy units within our Colonial Domains suffer {MoralePenalty} and {PsionicResistance} resistance.
我们的子民在致命的指令下反复地齐声吟诵教条，黑暗的颂歌将令任何人打消干涉我们计划的念头。[br/][br/]位于我们殖民地领域内的敌方单位减少 {MoralePenalty} 和 {PsionicResistance} 抵抗。
This unit suffers a {MoralePenalty} and {PsionicResistance} resistance penalty.
该单位受到 {MoralePenalty} 和 {PsionicResistance} 抵抗惩罚。
This unit deals an additional +{SadismDamageBoost} damage against units with low morale.
该单位对士气低迷的单位额外造成 +{SadismDamageBoost} 伤害。
对士气低迷的单位额外造成 +{SadismDamageBoost} 伤害。
Cover the world in darkness and despair.
将世界笼罩在黑暗与绝望之中。
Happiness reduced by -{unhappiness}[anger/].[br/]Martial Law will always kill Rioters.
幸福值减少 -{unhappiness}[anger/]。[br/]戒严令始终会杀死暴乱者。

Happiness reduced by -{unhappiness}[anger/].[br/]Martial Law will always kill Rioters.[br/]Has a {BrokenMindstrength}[strengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] to non-Psynumbra player units in combat.
幸福值减少 -{unhappiness}[anger/]。[br/]戒严令始终会杀死暴乱者。[br/]战斗中有 {BrokenMindstrength}[strengthPsyche/] 力量几率对非赛努布拉玩家单位施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。

Happiness reduced by -{unhappiness}[anger/].[br/]Martial Law will always kill Rioters.[br/]Has a {BrokenMindstrength}[strengthPsyche/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] to non-Psynumbra player units in combat.[br/]Applies [abilityblue]Dark Elation[/abilityblue] to Psynumbra player units during combat.
幸福值减少 -{unhappiness}[anger/]。[br/]戒严令始终会杀死暴乱者。[br/]战斗中有 {BrokenMindstrength}[strengthPsyche/] 力量几率对非赛努布拉玩家单位施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。[br/]在战斗期间对赛努布拉玩家单位施加[abilityblue]黑暗欢愉[/abilityblue]。
Infect a non-Psynumbra Colony and the surrounding area with The Dirge for {duration}, a Psionically-induced darkness that increases in strength as you build more Spires of Suffering.
让一个非赛努布拉殖民地及其周边区域沉浸在挽歌之中，持续 {duration}。[br/]这种由灵能产生的黑暗力量随苦难尖塔的建造数量增多而增强。
The song has been sung, the Dirge rings out over the targeted colony. The citizens rejoice in the glory of oblivion.
挽歌已经唱响，萦绕在目标殖民地。市民在遗忘的荣耀中欢欣起舞。
The souls of the target colony are warded against us, and the Dirge has failed. Its echoes have had some small effect, however, causing panic in the streets.
目标殖民地的居民对我们有所防护，“挽歌”计划失败。不过“挽歌”的回声还是产生了一定的效果，在该殖民地的街道中引起了恐慌。
An powerful Psionic attack has been launched against one of our colonies. The populace stumble through the streets in a daze, humming a tuneless melody and staring into space.
一种强大的灵能攻击袭击了我们的一个殖民地。人民茫然地在街道上踉跄而行，哼唱着没有音调的旋律凝视太空。
The enemy has attempted a Psionic attack on our colony. We have foiled their attempt, but the backlash from the attack has still affected a few citizens, leading to panic and riots.
敌人尝试向我们的殖民地发动灵能攻击。虽然我们阻止了敌人的计划，但灵能的反冲之力仍然影响了少部分居民，造成了恐慌和暴乱。

The Spire of Suffering unlocks The Dirge Doomsday weapon. Each additional Spire of Suffering that you build increases the level of the weapon, making it stronger.[br/][br/]Only one Spire of Suffering may be built per colony.
苦难尖塔可以解锁“挽歌”末日武器。每额外建造一座苦难尖塔，该武器便会升级并变得更加强大。[br/][br/]每个殖民地只能建造一座苦难尖塔。
The final step in the Psynumbra plan unleashes the most powerful Dirge upon the planet.[br/][br/]Requires The Dirge level 3.
赛努布拉计划中的最后一步便是在星球上释放最强大的挽歌。[br/][br/]需要挽歌达到等级 3。
As the symphony swells, the Dirge sweeps across the planet, filling the souls of the people with the harmony of oblivion. The crescendo approaches, the victory of the Abyss.
随着交响乐曲声音逐渐增强，挽歌扫过整个星球，让人们的灵魂充满了遗忘的和谐。乐曲到达高潮之时，就是深渊胜利之刻。
Kir'Ko knowledge of dark psionic arts enhance this unit, increasing damage by {PsionicMasteryDamage}.
该单位得到了奇尔寇黑暗灵能艺术知识的强化，伤害提升 {PsionicMasteryDamage}。
Assembly are masters of reassembly, and when this unit dies, they return as an Echo of Despair.
半机械人是改造工程的专家。该单位死亡时将复活并成为一个绝望回响。

Syndicate Psynumbra units find joy and encouragement in the servitude the Indentured provide. This unit deals {FueledServitudeDmg} for each Indentured unit in battle, to a maximum of {addedDamage}[damagepsyche/].
辛迪加赛努布拉单位能在签订的奴役契约中找到愉悦和斗志。战斗中每存在一个契约单位，该单位造成 {FueledServitudeDmg} 伤害，最多造成 {addedDamage}[damagepsyche/]。
{FueledServitudeDmg} damage for each Indentured unit in battle.
战斗中每存在一个契约单位，该单位造成 {FueledServitudeDmg} 伤害。

Attempt to curse target unit with insects made of psionic energy, causing intense pain. If the target dies while affected, the insects burst, dealing damage and spreading [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred] to enemy units within {hexrange} hexes.
尝试用灵能能量制造的昆虫诅咒目标单位，造成剧烈疼痛。如果受到影响的单位死亡，昆虫会发生爆炸，造成伤害并对 {hexrange} 个单元格范围内的敌人传播[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]。
{DarkLocustsChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Dark Locusts[/abilityred] to non-Mindless for {durationDarkLocusts}. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred] instead.
有 {DarkLocustsChance} 力量几率对非无意识单位施加[abilityred]黑暗蝗虫[/abilityred]，持续 {durationDarkLocusts}。如果抵抗，则施加[abilityred]破碎心灵[/abilityred]。

This unit is suffering {DarkLocustDamage} damage per turn.[br/]If this unit dies, it spreads discord to all friendly units within {hexrange} hexes, damaging them and applying [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred].
该单位每回合受到 {DarkLocustDamage} 伤害。[br/]如果该单位死亡，则其会在 {hexrange} 个单元格范围内的所有友方单位间传播混乱，造成伤害并施加[abilityred]心如死灰[/abilityred]。
Target a ground unit to shackle it with a dark vine that grasps at their mind.
以陆地单位为目标，黑暗的藤蔓能够束缚并控制他们的心灵。
Create dark vines in a 1 hex area that strangle affected unit's minds.
在 1 个单元格区域中制造可以束缚受影响单位心灵的黑暗藤蔓。
Teleport to target hex, dealing damage to adjacent enemy units.
传送至目标单元格，对相邻敌方单位造成伤害。

Channel the pain of the populace to reinforce our armies. Target colony gains {happinessPenalty}, and all units produced in the colony gain [abilityblue]Reinforced by Suffering[/abilityblue], granting them +{hitpointBonus} and +{damageBonus} damage.
引导人民的痛苦来强化我们的军队。目标殖民地获得 {happinessPenalty}，同时该殖民地生产的所有单位获得[abilityblue]苦痛强化[/abilityblue]，获得 +{hitpointBonus} 和 +{damageBonus} 伤害。
The Malictors have set up the channels, and the ambient suffering of the populace is being amplified, captured and channeled, ready for use in producing our armies.
恶毒者已经建立了通道，人民遭受的痛苦正在被放大、捕捉和引导，已经准备好用于生产我们的军队了。
Colony gains {happinessPenalty}, produced units gain [abilityblue]Reinforced By Suffering[/abilityblue]
殖民地获得 {happinessPenalty}，生产的单位获得[abilityblue]苦痛强化[/abilityblue]
This unit has been fortified by suffering and despair funneled from innocent souls during its production. It has +{hitpointBonus} and +{damageBonus} damage.
从无辜的灵魂处收集而来的痛苦和绝望使该单位在生产时得到了强化。该单位拥有 +{hitpointBonus} 和 +{damageBonus} 伤害。
One of our Spires of Suffering has been captured!
我们的一座苦难尖塔已被夺走！
You have lost a Spire of Suffering!
你失去了一座苦难尖塔！
{STR_Player} has lost a Spire of Suffering!
You have lost a Spire of Suffering. Our attempt at unleashing The Dirge has been canceled!
你失去了一座苦难尖塔。我们释放挽歌的计划被中止了！
{STR_Player} has lost a Spire of Suffering. Their attempt at unleashing The Dirge has been foiled!
{STR_Player}失去了一座苦难尖塔！他们释放挽歌的计划失败了！
A Player has unleashed The Dirge!
一名玩家已经释放了“挽歌”！
Building a Spire of Suffering has given {playerName} access to their Doomsday Weapon, The Dirge. It is weak now, but will become more powerful as more Spires of Suffering are constructed.
{playerName}通过建造苦难尖塔，现在可以使用末日武器“挽歌”了。虽然目前武器威力尚弱，但会随苦难尖塔数量的增多而变强。
By building a second Spire of Suffering, {playerName} has strengthened their Doomsday Weapon, The Dirge. You should plan raids to destroy these structures before they become too powerful.
{playerName}通过建造第二座苦难尖塔强化了“挽歌”末日武器。你应当在这些建筑变得过于强大之前策划突袭并将其摧毁。

By building their final Spire of Suffering, {playerName} has maximized the strength of their Doomsday Weapon, The Dirge. They are now close to fully unleashing it and winning the game. The time to strike is now!
{playerName}通过建造最后一座苦难尖塔末日武器“挽歌”达到了最强的威力。该玩家马上就可以完全释放该武器的力量来获得游戏胜利了。发动袭击就趁现在！
The Doomsday Timer has been paused! You must reclaim the lost Spire of Suffering, or you will lose your chance at unleashing The Dirge upon your enemies!
末日武器计时器已暂停！你必须夺回失去的苦难尖塔，否则你将失去向敌人释放“挽歌”的机会！
The loss of a Spire of Suffering has canceled The Dirge, ending the Doomsday Timer.
苦难尖塔的丢失致使“挽歌”的释放被打断，同时末日计时器停止。
The loss of a Spire of Suffering has weakened The Dirge, and your Doomsday operations have been canceled.
苦难尖塔的丢失弱化了“挽歌”的威力，你的末日行动遭到中止。

Our enemies have activated their Doomsday Weapon. The Dirge has spread across the planet, and your own Doomsday Weapon has been wiped out by the cataclysm. You have {numTurns} to destroy one of their Spires of Suffering, or they will win the game.
敌人激活了他们的末日武器，“挽歌”已经在整个星球上蔓延。你的末日武器也在这场大灾变中被摧毁。你需要在 {numTurns} 内摧毁一座敌人的苦难尖塔，否则敌人将获得游戏胜利。
The Dirge is active, and you will win in {numTurns} unless you lose one of your Spires of Suffering.
“挽歌”已激活，只要不失去任何苦难尖塔，你将在 {numTurns} 后获胜。
The Dirge is active, and {playerName} will win in {numTurns} unless you can destroy one of their Spires of Suffering.
“挽歌”已激活，{playerName}将在 {numTurns} 后获胜，除非你能在这此之前摧毁其一座苦难尖塔。
A Spire of Suffering has been captured. If it is destroyed, our Doomsday timer will be canceled. If you recapture it, you will be able to resume the countdown.
一座苦难尖塔已被夺走。如果尖塔被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果你重新夺回尖塔，计时器将会恢复。
A Spire of Suffering has been captured. If it is destroyed, the Doomsday timer will be canceled. If {playerName} recaptures it, then they will be able to resume the countdown.
一座苦难尖塔已被夺走。如果尖塔被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果{playerName}重新夺回尖塔，计时器将会恢复。
{playerName} is priming The Dirge Doomsday Weapon. If they are allowed to finish, your own Doomsday Weapon will be wiped out, and {playerName} will be but one step away from total victory!
{playerName}正在准备释放“挽歌”末日武器！如果成功释放，你的末日武器将被摧毁，{playerName}距离胜利也将仅剩一步之遥！
The last light is extinguished.[br/]You hear the mourning cry of the broken.[br/]You feast on the tattered remnants of your enemies.[br/]And yet, it all means nothing.[br/]You are victorious.
最后一丝光亮熄灭了。[br/]你听见了心灵破碎者的哀嚎。[br/]你尽情地欣赏敌人破碎的残骸。[br/]然而，这一切都毫无意义。[br/]你胜利了。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
